column1: #text=While casually browsing through my friends pictures online I discovered a new revelation .
#text=They are called Lush bath bombs and the are colorful scented fizz balls .
#text=I quickly ordered a few online from their website and when they came I was overcome with excitement .
#text=I brought a Pink Potion one with a flower inside and a Blue Dream glitter one .
#text=I put the Hello Kitty tub stopper in my bath tub and ran my bathwater until the tub was halfway full .
#text=Then I dropped the bath bomb in the water and was anointed by the wonderful smell of lavender .
#text=The water in the tub fizzled with pretty blue glitter .
#text=I got in an soaked for more than an hour and got out feeling like a million bucks .
#text=I seemed to be a thousand times cleaner than I was before I got it .
#text=I even smelled great the whole entire day .
